title: Death Penalty
description: Reporter Clay Douglas is furtively searching for clues to identify the killer responsible for the deaths of two girls in a small Georgia town. The case heats up as he delves into resources that he built during his criminal years, bringing a hidden side of the community into the light. Clay already has a very personal interest in the case so he has first hand knowledge of the horrific acts a serial killer is capable of. When nine-year-old Lanier Morris is abducted he fears that she may never be seen again. Will Fate intervene before this young girl slips into darkness?
author: Frances Edge
